ing: 1 cucumber - peeled, halved lengthwise, and sliced
des: "This is an awesome salad!! Very refreshing with peas, cucumber, and cheese. Super easy to make also!"
ins: Combine the cucumber, peas, and Monterey Jack cheese in a bowl. Whisk the mayonnaise and milk together in a small bowl; pour the dressing over the salad. Stir to coat.
